column5: First DSLR camera phone, Love it
column6: - Specifically its night mode pictures are mind boggling, i think no other phone camera can beat it.- 10x Zoom in capacity is great, pictures are very clear, no other phone camera can beat it.- Other like Slow motion, Portraits and other mode are also giving great pictures.- 40mp not support zoom in but it's okey.- Check attached snaps.Leica lense are German made company lenses, Very powerful lenses.I have special purchased this phone for photography and im 100% satisfiedand recommended for photography lovers.

column5: A splendid option for photography enthusiasts
column6: Purchased this during the great Indian sale. The main reason for purchasing this phone was for the camera. And it truly lives up to the expectations. Night time photography is wonderful. AI scene detection is useful in some instances but bothersome in other cases. Greenery mode increases the green hue, cloud mode increases the blue hue of the sky giving some unnatural looking effects. But the AI mode can be dismissed from the screen easily or turned off altogether. Zoom works wonders without compromising on image quality. So, if you are a photography buff, go for it.

The reason i gave 5 star to everythingTo start withIt has powerful battery lifeIf u have good cameraBig ScreenAnd u on social networkU need to have good batteryCamera is brilliant in master AI modeAnd night mode is amzingHave mini screen feature to minimise the screenAnd input is amazing have dolby atmosAnd output is goodNot too. Loud bt clear

You love photography then this is smart buy. All you get in this phone is the best. The drawback is no memory slot. The 3D monograph photo are not perfect. Rest all cool. Enjoying the phone. The metallic blue looks pretty amazing.

The phone over all is bestBest picture quality with lecia triple lens cameraDolby atoms audio quality is bestThe facial recognition unlock is a perfect and faster than IPhone 10I would definitely recommend this phone

column5: Excellent Phone with premium look and capabilities, Great rear and low light camera
column6: This is a very good phone with excellent camera capabilities and photo experience. I worked with almost all features of this phone and this is an ultimate phone to buy /use, especially who has/have great interest for camera. Rear Camera and Lowlight images are too good and as expected. However the selfie camera must be improvised by adding more features as I was more interested for Selfies.. Sound is loud and clear, no noise and battery is lasting for 2- 3 days based on the usage. When people see this phone for the firt time, they feel amazed by its premium look and feel. Overall Best Camera phone with premium looks and feel for this price tag, great technology from Huawei and I am happy to have this phone.
Great looks. Great camera. Great battery. IPhone killer....

column5: Good phone with very few updates.
column6: Till date received only one update for this phone while persons using Honor (sub-brand) received multiple updates within the same period.Very good product. The exception is the picture taken in night mode. No comparison required.

column5: Value for ?? money, best rear camera Mobile
column6: After one month usage I post this review, I bought this mobile for 55k, I'm learning cinematography so I need the best picture and video quality Mobile. After a lot of research I choose this mobile. Undoubtedly the p20 pro rear camera have a great picture quality????, but the Huawei failed to bring the same picture quality in front camera????.Sound quality is really good i like the bass and treble in Dolby Atmos while connecting type c cable. PS: Dolby Atmos doesn't work with Bluetooth headsets or speaker's.Battery quality: thanks for super fast charging. Battery stands upto 8hrs when we use continuesly. Once the reach 10% Battery started drains quickly to 0% within 30min so we should activate the ultra power saver mode.Pros:Rear camera 4.5/5Sound quality 4/5Display 5/5Performance 5/5Battery 3.5/5Cons:Front camera 2/5Only one stereo speaker.Face id doesn't work in dark room.

column5: Huawei P20 Pro when you deserve the best
column6: This camera is excellent.  This smartphone rocks...  I thought about going with a few other brands out there, and I think you know the name brands that are out there. Note 9, iPhone, Sony.  This Huawei P20 intrigue me the leica camera lens is awesome my photos are alive.  And to think I was looking at the P 10 last year.  I am so happy that I waited.  Bottom-line I don't have any complaints on my P20.  And if I did I would not know where to began because there is so few.  5 stars across the board simply stated...Kenneth DElgin, IL
